query: SELECT id, title, theme, description, coverPrompt FROM albums WHERE coverUrl IS NULL ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT id, title, theme, description, coverPrompt FROM albums WHERE coverUrl IS NULL ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20

rows.title: The Decency Anthem
rows.theme: Small honest acts as revolution—pocket change becoming policy change; decency as the national anthem.

rows.title: Mercy Louder Than Megaphones
rows.theme: Micro-uprisings of empathy—groceries at the doorstep, forgiveness on the bridge, mercy louder than megaphones.

rows.title: The Gentle Uprising
rows.theme: Revolution through compassion—small daily acts as the real uprising: feed, forgive, stand tall.

rows.title: The Cartography of Mercy
rows.theme: A blueprint for mercy in a hard world—songs that hack the heart toward empathy, truth, and repair.
